title: MPH: Emotional Norris is making bad calls in fight with cool-headed Piastri
summary: A third of the way through the 2025 F1 season, McLaren's title fight is shaping into a psychological duel as much as a physical one â€” with one key element giving Oscar Piastri's the edge over Lando Norris, saysMark Hughes
